text: @ChristinaKTLA @dziedzic_leslie @GavinNewsom Why aren't you addressing the GLARING FACT that weeks of protests are the true cause? #COVID19 doesn't care about our rights, but we should. We protesters DON'T have the right to INFECT our brothers and sisters with the #coronavirus. We must take responsibility for ourselves.
